sentence.Network_en: Medical aid must be sent to the stricken area posthaste.
sentence.Network_cn: 灾区需用医药,急如星火.

sentence.Network_en: Please come and help me posthaste, I really need you.
sentence.Network_cn: 请尽快来帮我, 我非常需要你.

sentence.Network_en: Please send your answer to me posthaste.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 十字的解释--... ... 十万八千里〖 polesapart〗 十万火急〖 posthaste;mosturgent〗 十羊九牧〖 overstaffed;beununiformlyordered〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... postgraduate 研究所学生 posthaste 特快 posthole 洞.

entry.def: If you go somewhere or do something post-haste, you go there or do it as quickly as you can.

example.ex: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
example.tran: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

auth_sentence.content: When I'd sheepishly say no, she'd point out that I could talk to her at home, and shoo me off the line posthaste.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I'd sheepishly say no, she'd point out that I could talk to her at home, and shoo me off the line posthaste.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I'd sheepishly say no, she'd point out that I could talk to her at home, and shoo me off the line posthaste.
